summary:
Legacy of the Tyrants is a serie of dungeons linked by a questline that will invite you to explore each of them.
There is a story behind thoses dungeons and the quest that lead you to explore them and it will uncover slowly as you advance in the quests.
descriptionHtml:
HOW TO USE IT:
The quest line will be delivered to you directly by the courier giving you a note to meet the Questgiver.
He generally wait one day of your traveling before delivering the next Quest notes.

CURRENT CONTENT:
6 fully designed dungeons with clutters, encounters, loot, etc.
One quest for each dungeon that help you discover them and advance in the Quest line.
The dungeons can be explored without following the quests if you find their location.
The 4th dungeon can only be opened by following the quest steps. (others dungeons may be explored without the quest)
QuestGiver have now her own house south of Whiterun and quests are updated to point at her new location.

REWARD SPOIL:
Some people asked what exactly is the effect of the final reward item.
Melee and Unarmed Damage increased, Resist damage increased, and the visual effect when worn.

Special Thanks:
Thanks to Nyhil for review of the dialogues and book text to fix some mistakes of my not native english ;)
Special thanks to Jena-Angela for help in making a custom item for the end artifact.

Additionnal Credits:
Anduniel for the very nice voice acting of the quest giver. ( http://steamcommunity.com/id/Anduniel/ )


Latest version of that Mod can be found on the Steam WorkShop:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=12243&tscn=1335833253
You may as well use a downloadable version of the mod from the skyrim nexus website:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15259
author: Hellay
